# Examples

Run these with `uv run python examples/<file>`.

*   **`01_concurrent_kvstore.py`**
    Simple GenServer state management. Start here.

*   **`02_pipeline_processing.py`**
    Producer -> Workers -> Consumer. Shows how to flow data through actors.

*   **`03_task_queue.py`**
    A job queue with a dynamic worker pool.

*   **`04_pubsub_system.py`**
    Topic-based routing and broadcasting.
